channel.title: Clearly, Your Retarded
channel.description:
ok so today this kid named Scotty comes up to me and says that his IQ is like 259 and im like :fffuuu:
So then i tell him that there is no possible way in hell that his IQ is 259, and he probably just learned that from a Facebook quiz, and he calles me a Fag, so im like:fffuuu:
then i call him a douche for calling me a fag and then he calles me a "fucking cunt sucker" if i remember correctly and, and then im like :fffuuu:
so then i kick him in the shin and hes like :fffuuu: and then im like :fffuuu:
and then i just walk away.
3 hours later i see him eating a 3 muscateers, so i walk over to him and say "you eatin a 3 muskateers? and he says "NO ITS A SNICKERS YOU FAG!!!" so then im like:fffuuu:
and then i say "no its a 3 muskateers" and then hes like:fffuuu:
and then he says that if i call it a 3 muskateers 1 more time he will "kick me in the fucking ball sack" and so then im like:fffuuu:
then i call it a 3 muskateers again and he attempts to kick me in the balls, but i easily side step him.
then i say "you wanna be suspended from school? Faggot" and then hes like:fffuuu:
But then suddenly a teacher comes over and sees whats going on and he takes us both to the principles office. so i sit down in the waiting room while they talk to him, then they come out and ask to talk to me.
so i go in there and they said that he said that i bully him all the time (which is a complete lie, he may be the biggest douche in the whole world but i dont bully him) and that i called him fat, and that [i]I[/i] wuz going to be suspend because i bully him all the time, so im like:fffuuu:
then i get picked up by my mom, and as you can probably tell, she wasn't very happy, and then she says to me "whats wrong with you?" so then im like :fffuuu:
and so then i try to explain to her that is wasn't my fault, it wuz some big fat douches fault, and that i rarely ever talk to him, and then she doesnt belive me, so im like :fffuuu:
so then as were walking out of the school, he calls ME retarded, so then im like :ffffuuu:
and then i say to him "No clearly YOUR Retarted", and he starts crying and runs away so then im like :ffffuuu:
and then my mom says that im grounded for the rest of the summer for doing that so then im like :ffffuuu:
and then i go home and my mom takes everything away from me so im like:ffffuuu:
and now i just feel like shit
and want to kill that fucking asshole for doing this to me
also i know im going to be flamed to hell and back for this, but i had to share my anger

item.title: Clearly, Your Retarded
item.dc:creator: Torpede
item.description:
Skilgannon:

Clearly you are. Your improper use of grammar is, quite frankly, apalling. That combined with your over-use of the phrase: “I’m/he was like” and your inability to type a basic 8 character smiley code through the latter part of what I will laughingly call a “post”, just goes to show the fact that you fail. Hard.

Good day sir.

EDIT: Also, there’s a rage thread elsewhere on the forum.

Read full topic

item.title: Clearly, Your Retarded
item.dc:creator: Ballsopt
item.description:
well, he was pretty fascinating, and has a lot of truth (novelty patterns amirite), but the whole 2012 timewave zero is where I draw the line. Not that it’d be pretty cool if that ends up happening, but i’d rather get to be an old man before exploding into a pure consciousness being

Read full topic

item.title: Clearly, Your Retarded
item.dc:creator: Ballsopt
item.description:
explain anything? I just like sharing my stories :retard:

which is why i said he’s a psycho, not “sane”, if that is what you call it. he frequently takes acid, and says all sorts of crazy shit. his eyes start welling up in tears whenever he talks to people, but is totally calm. he’s been sending me obscene texts since then, and he thinks Terrance Mckenna is some sort of messiah. The guy was not all there, by any means. but he was also heinously clever. His friends told me he’s done this before, but they didn’t bother telling me until after. Well, live and learn.

Read full topic

item.title: Clearly, Your Retarded
item.dc:creator: mattemuse
item.description:
like i said im not judging so you don’t need to explain anything or write walls of text, there’s just no way a sane person would do something that dangerous, and that expensive, for no reason whatsoever. Although I’ve heard a similar story from a friend about a pot of coffee in a police station, that wasn’t a sane person, and i don’t 100% believe it either.

Read full topic

item.title: Clearly, Your Retarded
item.dc:creator: Ballsopt
item.description:
well, you’re wrong. but since it’s kind of a long story, i’ll clarify a bit.
i don’t know for sure the exact amount, but i shared a room with the guy for a quarter. the amount he gave me once in the past was about 3 drops worth, which i suppose is standard. After i drank from my thermos (which i don’t anymore), I started tripping harder than i ever have immediately and i knew it was him. i was still hallucinating two days after and went to the doctor (but i was paranoid enough to withdraw the details of the LSD and my relationship with said fucker), so i was given a week’s worth of antipsychotics (with plans for more), as the doctor (whom i later found out from my mom) had decided i was having a schizophrenic episode. [i told them the truth later.]
then a day later the kid left his cellphone in my room and i read his text messages with his brother, and he had told him that he had indeed squirted a whole dropper into my thermos, while he himself took one drops worth after i started tripping. i decided to use that against him and even gave the campus police his number (to my knowledge, he doesn’t know this). he started acting strange and left for DC, saying he’d be back, and made sure to threaten him with a cryptic text warning him not to even think of coming back once he got in his ride. 8)
as for regular drug use, I smoke weed, and that’s fine by me. no need to obfuscate that here.

but then there’s the trip itself :fffuuu:

Read full topic

item.title: Clearly, Your Retarded
item.dc:creator: Ballsopt
item.description:
baconeggs:

That actually sounds quite entertaining. Film the room for a few days and report back here.

The quarter is over for me, but man there were some cool stories, bro :fffuuu:
I drove a heroin addicted suitemate into the woods (I think the cops have since picked him up),
showed a sober but equally unwanted suitemate a looping video of homer strangling bart and he started bawling like a baby (he wouldn’t leave my room when i was trying to watch 'Lambs, despite the aggressive hints i dropped),
blackmailed one guy [who once slipped me an entire vile of LSD] to leave the campus (back to D.C.); he was pretty psycho.
blackmailed this girl who was manipulating half the campus for booze, coke and sex (she went back to NY),
and verbally neutered an unsuspecting jock/asshole on his birthday (which got me a nod from the ladies present :3).
just in the past couple weeks…
all of them deserved it, i swear :freeman:

Read full topic

item.title: Clearly, Your Retarded
item.dc:creator: super_lurker
item.description:
today at the library i saw some scribbles on the desk i was reading at
it read

I HEART SEX YO NIGGAS

it was followed by a reply, from probably the same lonely person

LOL ME TO

YEAAAAAA!!!
i could not study or focus or anything simply because the person could not tell his to’s from his too’s

then people go around insulting people by writing things down as “your”

your’s is possessive, you’re is a shortened form of “you are”. “your retarded” states that your retarded something (that isn’t even a sentence) is doing something, it’s missing a few nouns and verbs, now if you had just said “you’re” it would have gone, “you are retarded”
it is a very clear statement questioning your intelligence
you’re fat

Read full topic
